dublin_core.dcvalue: In spite of a sad economic situation new technologies crossed significant stage in 2001 and 2002 deployment A great number of Networks were constituted or are on the way to be Integration and use of these technologies now exceed the framework of the simple experimentation A 2002 principal outstanding facts press review of telemedicine and oncology is thus presented and a state of the networks and the tools for formation communication and healthcare
[Informatics, networks and technological current events in cancerology].
